author: Staff Reporter
text:
Three people were injured in a cylinder explosion early Wednesday morning. Police sources said Babu and Srinivasan, were drinking along with their friend Nagaraj in his house.

At around 2 a.m. on Wednesday, they tried to turn on the gas to cook when the cylinder exploded. All of them sustained injuries and were admitted to the Kilpauk Medical College. -staff reporter
title: Cylinder blast: 3 hurt
